department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Stephen Dragon works at Tellabs Operations, Inc., and is a Director of Engineering of an optical networking engineering group.  He has over 20 years of experience in product development and planning in the telecommunication and networking industry.  He received his Master's degree in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science from the University of Illinois at Chicago, a Master's in Business Administration at DePaul, and a BSEE degree from the University of Michigan.  Prior to teaching at DePaul, Steve taught telecommunication technology courses at the DeVry Institute of Technology.  Steve has taught TDC 460, 464 and 565.
